info.title: Tallyfy
info.description: Tallyfy is beautiful workflow software that helps you create, track and scale any repeatable process. It helps you eliminate the use of flowcharts, forms and emails by digitizing manual business processes and approval workflows.

get.description: Get all users belonging to an organization
Get all tasks that belong to a specific member

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search Tasks by their Process name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: You can search all Tasks by status

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Add minus sign (-) before sort value if you want to sort records in descending order. Ex: sort=-improvements

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Retrieve additional data from Tasks. Separate multiple options with a comma

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which results page to retrieve. Default is 1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many Tasks per page. Default is 10

run_id.description: Unique identifier for the Task's Process (only for Process Tasks)
run_id.title: Process ID

alias.description: Unique alias for the Task (only for Process Tasks)
alias.title: Task Alias

archived_at.description: Date the Task was archived at
archived_at.title: Archived At

completer_id.description: ID of the the member who completed the Task
completer_id.title: Completer ID

overdue_tasks.description: Number of overdue Tasks on the current page
overdue_tasks.title: Overdue Tasks

tasks_due_soon.description: Number of Tasks on the current page that are due soon
tasks_due_soon.title: Tasks Due Soon

total.description: Number of Tasks across all pages
total.title: Total Tasks

count.description: Number of Tasks on the current page
count.title: Page Count

post.summary: Invite a new member to your organization
post.description: Invite a new member to your organization

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Specify which Blueprint version to retrieve. (Works only in case of single Blueprint endpoint)

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: get relational data, separated by comma

post.description: Launch a process using a blueprint

name.description: Name to give the new Process
name.title: Name of Process

checklist_id.description: ID of the Blueprint to start the process
checklist_id.title: Blueprint ID

summary.description: Summary notes to include with the Process
summary.title: Summary of Process

checklist_id.description: ID of Blueprint the Process originated from
checklist_id.title: Blueprint ID

complete.description: How many tasks in the Process have been completed
complete.title: tasks completed

created_at.description: Date Kick Off field was created (if KO exists)
created_at.title: kick off created date

field_type.description: Kick Off field type (if KO exists)
field_type.title: kick off field type

label.description: Kick Off field label (if KO exists)
label.title: kick off field label

updated_at.description: Date Kick Off field was last updated (if KO exists)
updated_at.title: kick off field updated at

position.description: Kick Off position relative to other Kick Off fields (if KO exists)
position.title: kick off position

required.description: Whether the Kick Off is required (if KO exists)
required.title: Kick Off requirement

value.description: Value submitted to Kick Off field (if KO exists)
value.title: kick off field value

created_at.description: Date the process was created at
created_at.title: created at

started_at.description: Date the Process was started at
started_at.title: started at

last_updated.description: Date the Process was last updated
last_updated.title: last updated

completed_at.description: Date process was completed at (if applicable)
completed_at.title: completed at

archived_at.description: Date Process was archived at (if applicable)
archived_at.title: archived at

due_date_passed.description: Whether the Process due date has passed
due_date_passed.title: due date passed

due_soon.description: Whether the process is due soon
due_soon.title: due soon

post.summary: Add comment, report issue, resolve issue on a task

items.description: Users to assign the task to
items.title: Users
Guests
items.description: guest emails to assign the task to (separate emails by comma)

id.description: Unique identifier for the created Task
id.title: Task ID

alias.description: unique alias of the created Task
alias.title: Task alias

deadline.description: Deadline of the created Task in date-time format
deadline.title: Task Deadline

owner_id.description: Unique identifier for the creator of the Task
owner_id.title: Creator ID

contributors.description: The list of users who can update the checklist.

start_run_permissions.description: The list of groups and users who can access the run.

contributors.description: The list of users who can update the Blueprint.

tasks.description:
Array of Tasks with the key is the ID of a Step's checklist, the value is the ID of the assignees (owners) of these step. In case of missing this field, all Steps of the Process will be selected.
The taskdata deadline is the due time of a Task, if it is not specified, the default due time is 1 hour from run creation time

prerun.description: Array of Kick Off form fields with the key being the ID of the Kick Off Field (from the current Blueprint) and its associated value.

invisibility.description: The list of groups the step is invisible to.
The list of groups the step is invisible to.

tags.name: Token
tags.description: Get access token using client ID and client secret.
